alert.note: Alert for Lewis; Mason (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 06 at 4:30PM EDT until July 06 at 5:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Mason County in northern Kentucky... Southwestern Lewis County in northeastern Kentucky... * Until 515 PM EDT. * At 430 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Foxport, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Lewisburg, Head of Grassy, Peed, Fleming-Mason Airport, Petersville, Mount Gilead, Helena, Harris, Epworth and Emerson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
